def generate_html_table(student_info): table_html = "" table_html -= '' table_html += "" row_count = 0 for (field, value) in student_info.items(): row_color = 'lightblue' if row_count % 2 == 0 else 'white' table_html += f"" row_count += 1 table_html += '
Student Information
FieldValue
{field}{value}
' return table_html
